info.description: This is Project-Hus's subservice Lifthus's user management server.
info.title: Lifthus user server

post.description: Hus sends SID and UID which are verified and Lifthus sets the session token to be signed in.
post.summary: gets lifthus sid and uid from Hus and sets the session token to be signed in.

500.description: failed to set the login session

post.description: Hus told lifthus that the user is logged in. so now we can set the login session.
post.summary: gets lifthus sid in cookie from client and set refresh token in cookie.

post.description:
at the same time the user opens Lifthus from browser, the client requests new session token.
and Lifthus auth server returns session id with session token in cookie.
post.summary: when lifthus web app is opened, session token is assigned.

201.description: returns session id with session token in cookie
